bug.author: gladuo
bug.summary: got an error when translate a GRU -brnn model
bug.description:
<denchmark-code>/Users/ChaiDuo/.virtualenvs/pytorch/bin/python /Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Project/OpenNMT-py/translate.py Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Project/OpenNMT-py/translate.py", line 162, in <module> main() File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Project/OpenNMT-py/translate.py", line 109, in main tgtBatch) File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Project/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Translator.py", line 268, in translate pred, predScore, attn, goldScore = self.translateBatch(src, tgt) File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Project/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Translator.py", line 117, in translateBatch encStates = (self.model._fix_enc_hidden(encStates[0]), File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Project/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Models.py", line 166, in _fix_enc_hidden return h.view(h.size(0) // 2, 2, h.size(1), h.size(2)) \ RuntimeError: dimension 2 out of range of 2D tensor at /Users/soumith/code/builder/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensor.c:24
Process finished with exit code 1 </denchmark-code>
got an error when translate a GRU -brnn model

comments.comment: Almost the same here, I was doing a English-Chinese translation with LSTM, but this problem happens with or without brnn for me ï¼š( Traceback (most recent call last): File "translate.py", line 160, in <module> main() File "translate.py", line 105, in main tgtBatch) File "/home/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Translator.py", line 264, in translate src, tgt, indices = dataset[0] File "/home/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Dataset.py", line 60, in __getitem__ align_right=False, include_lengths=True, dtype=self._type) File "/home/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Dataset.py", line 29, in _batchify lengths = [x.size(0) for x in data] RuntimeError: dimension 0 out of range of 0D tensor at /b/wheel/pytorch-src/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensor.c:24

I fixed the problem here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/commit/fed29911bfab8ea0cad1d97b6448c2d73b4982ec>mattiadg@fed2991</denchmark-link>
but that was before the merge of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/OpenNMT/OpenNMT-py/pull/66>#66</denchmark-link> .
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mattiadg>@mattiadg</denchmark-link> Seems nice, but I think both brnn and GRU have some problems, and only have not solved my problem. But thank you for your code.

Can you tell me what have you done? I ran a training with python train.py -data data/example.train.pt -layers 1 -save_model model.bi -log_interval 50 -gpus 2 -rnn_type GRU -brnn And then the translation does not produce errors

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mattiadg>@mattiadg</denchmark-link> thx. default layers and log_interval, using your code, and got <denchmark-code>Traceback (most recent call last): File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Git/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/translate.py", line 162, in <module> main() File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Git/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/translate.py", line 109, in main tgtBatch) File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Git/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Translator.py", line 281, in translate pred, predScore, attn, goldScore = self.translateBatch(src, tgt) File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Git/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Translator.py", line 183, in translateBatch Variable(input, volatile=True), decStates, context, decOut) File "/Users/ChaiDuo/.virtualenvs/pytorch/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 206, in __call__ result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs) File "/Users/ChaiDuo/Code/Git/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/onmt/Models.py", line 155, in forward emb_t.squeeze(0), rnn_output, attn_output TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not callable </denchmark-code>
not sure what is the problem...
Can you give me the commands you used for training and for translations so that I can try to replicate the error?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/mattiadg>@mattiadg</denchmark-link> I just changed <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mattiadg/OpenNMT-py/blob/master/onmt/Models.py#L158>code</denchmark-link> to and everything goes fine... I use python train.py -data xxx -save_model xxx -gpus 0 1 2 3 -rnn_type GRU -brnn Thank you.
Thanks for pointing out the problem. The last that you mentioned should not be related to GRU or brnn. I'll give it a further look .
thanks, i am closing the issue. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/gladuo>@gladuo</denchmark-link> consider to open a separate issue for your second problem if needed.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/rhebok>@rhebok</denchmark-link> did you get your problem solved?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/KEMDAK>@KEMDAK</denchmark-link> thought it was another issue. Yep, problem was with the empty lines in the training file (some sentences didn't have translations). I deleted those (and corresponding lines in the source file) and it worked.
